meanings.sent1: The old clock misfunctions often and stops ticking.
meanings.sent2: My computer misfunctions when too many programs are open.
meanings.sent3: It's like the toaster decided to misfunction just when I wanted toast!
meanings.sent4: The team's communication misfunctioned like a broken telephone chain.
meanings.sent5: The car's engine misfunctioned loudly, causing a cloud of smoke to billow out.

meanings.sent1: The misfunction of the printer delayed the report's printing.
meanings.sent2: The misfunction of the traffic lights caused a long delay.
meanings.sent3: The misfunction in the vending machine gave out free snacks by mistake!
meanings.sent4: The misfunction in the system was like a glitch in a video game.
meanings.sent5: The misfunction of the elevator left everyone stranded on different floors.
